scripts.preinstall: sudo apt-get -y install python-pip; sudo pip install rasa; pip install rasa_nlu[spacy]; python -m spacy download en_core_web_md; python -m spacy link en_core_web_md en; pip install rasa_nlu[tensorflow]
scripts.start: python -m rasa_nlu.server --path /projects & python -m rasa_core.run --enable_api -d models/dialogue -u models/nlu/current -o out.log
